This was by far the best priced lunch we had!  You could get either 2 slices of pizza & a soda for 3,90 euros, pasta & a soda, or a salad & soda for 3,90 euros!  3,90 euros for that is a GREAT price for BCN!!! You walk up to pizza counter & tell them what two slices you want.  Then you move to left(bar & register area) & pay!  The mushroom pizza was good!  I had some of my friend's pasta salad (which was a nice size) & it was really good too!  Definitely a place to stop if looking for good food on a budget!!  Like most places in that area, the dining area is small but they have bar stools too.
